abstract.original_text: Supplementary Figure 1. Phylogenetic tree for complete genomes of 91 representative IOL CHIKV strains constructed using the maximum likelihood method. Bootstrap values and sl1-4-specific substitutions are indicated. The SL07 strain used as a genetic background for all in vivo experiments is highlighted with an asterisk.

sentences.segment_text: Phylogenetic tree for complete genomes of 91 representative IOL CHIKV strains constructed using the maximum likelihood method .
Bootstrap values and sl1-4-specific substitutions are indicated .
The SL07 strain used as a genetic background for all in vivo experiments is highlighted with an asterisk .

abstract.original_text: The purple arrow highlights strain LK(EH)CH18608 with the E2-K233E substitution.

sentences.segment_text: The purple arrow highlights strain LK ( EH ) CH18608 with the E2-K233E substitution .

abstract.original_text: The blue diamond highlights the Thailand-2009_CK11/53 strain of sl1 used in competition experiment (see Supplementary Fig. 2) . The bar indicates 0.2% nucleotide sequence divergence.

sentences.segment_text: The blue diamond highlights the Thailand-2009 _ CK11/53 strain of sl1 used in competition experiment ( see Supplementary Fig. 2 ) .
The bar indicates 0.2 % nucleotide sequence divergence .

abstract.original_text: (a) Schematic representation of the experimental design. Table shows genetic differences between the competing viruses. A 1:1 ratio (based on pfu) of wt (SL07-226V_Apa) and mut (contains one of the sl2-specific mutations) viruses was presented to Thai colony A.

sentences.segment_text: ( a ) Schematic representation of the experimental design .
Table shows genetic differences between the competing viruses .
A 1:1 ratio ( based on pfu ) of wt ( SL07-226V _ Apa ) and mut ( contains one of the sl2-specific mutations ) viruses was presented to Thai colony A.
